response.name: Iron Man
response.description: Tony Stark, a billionaire genius, builds a powered suit of armor and becomes the armored superhero Iron Man. Using his technological expertise and wit, Iron Man fights against evil to protect the world.
quotes: Sometimes you gotta run before you can walk.
response.creator: Stan Lee, Larry Lieber, Don Heck, Jack Kirby

response.name: Captain America
response.description: Steve Rogers, a frail young man, volunteers for a top-secret experiment and becomes Captain America, a super soldier dedicated to upholding justice and defending the ideals of freedom. With his shield and unwavering courage, Captain America fights for what is right.
quotes: I can do this all day.
I'm just a kid from Brooklyn.
I'm with you 'til the end of the line.
response.creator: Joe Simon, Jack Kirby

response.name: Thor
response.description: Thor Odinson, the god of thunder, wields the enchanted hammer Mjolnir and possesses incredible strength and control over lightning. As the prince of Asgard, Thor learns humility and becomes a mighty hero, defending the Nine Realms and battling powerful adversaries.
quotes: I am Thor, son of Odin!
response.creator: Stan Lee, Larry Lieber, Jack Kirby

response.name: Black Widow
response.description: Natasha Romanoff, also known as Black Widow, is a highly skilled spy and assassin. Trained in the Red Room, she uses her expertise in martial arts and espionage to carry out missions for S.H.I.E.L.D. and the Avengers, all while seeking redemption for her past actions.
quotes: I'm always picking up after you boys.
I have nothing to prove to you.
I'm done running from my past.
response.creator: Stan Lee, Don Rico, Don Heck

response.name: Hulk
response.description: Bruce Banner, a brilliant scientist, transforms into the raging green behemoth known as the Hulk whenever he gets angry or overwhelmed with emotions. Possessing immense strength and near-invulnerability, the Hulk battles both inner demons and external threats, using his incredible power for good.
response.creator: Stan Lee, Jack Kirby
